author: Brett Samuels
title: Trump expresses support for Asian Americans after repeatedly using term 'Chinese virus'
description: President Trump on Monday expressed support for Asian Americans after repeatedly referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese virus," a term some have criticized as racist and warned is fostering discrimination."It...
